name: Tricks and Treats (itch) (GameMeow)
description:
Tricks and Treats is a multiplayer game about collecting more treats than your opponents! Strategically collect your candies to score mega points! Play sneaky tricks on your opponents to get the upper hand!

How to Play!

The game plays like a typical card game. Players take turns, followed by the player on their right.

Players will take turns collecting 3 candies (pay special attention to their value and abilities, if you choose candies that synergize well, you can score big points!) Then players will take 1 turn playing a trick card.

First player to 100 points wins!

A note on multiplayer:

The game uses port 34567 TCP/UDP, so make sure your firewall allows it if you are having issues finding a lobby. The lobby will automatically start the game 30-60 seconds after 2 players join to avoid long wait times for a multiplayer game.

I tried to work all the bugs out, but due to time constraints I may have missed some. If the server appears down for a long period of time, please feel free to let me know and I will take a look.
